title: CMFRI Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Central Marine Fisheries Research Institute (CMFRI) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the CMFRI Recruitment 2026 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply before the last date of applica...
